name: Netbench TCP BW - Client
command: parallel ::: 'sudo usr/benchmarks/netbench/run.sh tcp-bw server 1000 1048576' 'sleep 10 && sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -display none -serial stdio -kernel rusty-loader-x86_64 -cpu host -enable-kvm -device isa-debug-exit,iobase=0xf4,iosize=0x04 -initrd build/local_prefix/opt/hermit/x86_64-hermit/extra/benchmarks/tcp-client-bw -smp 4 -m 1024M -netdev user,id=u1,hostfwd=tcp::7878-:7878,hostfwd=udp::9975-:9975,net=192.168.76.0/24,dhcpstart=192.168.76.9 -device virtio-net-pci,netdev=u1,disable-legacy=on,packed=on,mq=on -append "-- 0.0.0.0 7878 1000 1048576 1"'

name: Netbench TCP BW - Server
command: parallel ::: 'sleep 10 && sudo usr/benchmarks/netbench/run.sh tcp-bw client 100 3000' 'sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -display none -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -cpu host -enable-kvm -device isa-debug-exit,iobase=0xf4,iosize=0x04 -initrd build/local_prefix/opt/hermit/x86_64-hermit/extra/benchmarks/tcp-server-bw -smp 2 -m 1024M -netdev user,id=u1,hostfwd=tcp::7878-:7878,net=192.168.76.0/24,dhcpstart=192.168.76.9 -device virtio-net-pci,netdev=u1,disable-legacy=on,packed=on,mq=on -append "-- 127.0.0.1 7878 100 3000 1"'

name: Netbench TCP Latency - Server
command: parallel ::: 'sleep 10 && sudo usr/benchmarks/netbench/run.sh tcp-latency client 100 2000' 'sudo qemu-system-x86_64 -display none -serial stdio -kernel hermit-loader-x86_64 -cpu host -enable-kvm -device isa-debug-exit,iobase=0xf4,iosize=0x04 -initrd build/local_prefix/opt/hermit/x86_64-hermit/extra/benchmarks/tcp-server-latency -smp 2 -m 1024M -netdev user,id=u1,hostfwd=tcp::7878-:7878,net=192.168.76.0/24,dhcpstart=192.168.76.9 -device virtio-net-pci,netdev=u1,disable-legacy=on,packed=on,mq=on -append "-- 127.0.0.1 7878 100 2000 1"'
